Second Annual Modified New Years Eve 2006! [Breaks + Drum and Bass + 
Electro + House + Hardcore + Progressive + Techno + Trance] Your talent 
for the evening: Yagi (OTC/HCFTP), Thomas Kent (Ill Behavior/Modified), 
Shard (OTC), Molly Mush (OTC/HCFTP), Macadio (First Light/DEFSF), Kris 
Kent (Ill Behavior), Kid Wicked (Tunnel-Vizions), John Econ (Breaks - 
Chico, Ca), Joey Antix (Bionic Bubbles), ill-d theDJ (Thoughtcrime Inc.), 
Hyjinx (Modified), Go-Zania (HCFTP/Hard Science), G.A.M.M.A. 
(Stilldream/Techno Truth), Eric Foard (Stretch Entertainment), Durty 
(Nocturnalism), Dulce Vita (Wink@butter/DefinitionofhouseSF), DJ Owl 
(Electro - SF, Ca), DJOrionZ (brproductions/N.L>P.), DJ 2QT (HCFTP/Nu 
Vision), Cubehead (Subscience/OTC) with MC Enhale (Fab 5 Battle Crew), 
Cmos vs Juave (Antiserum), Christhejunglist (Primitive-Science/KCRH 89.9 
FM), Chel-C Faith (DEFSF) - Live PA!, Carlos Alfonzo 
(brproductions/YuccaTribe/Wild 94.9 HouseNation/Zapatista's), Element 
(Modified) <> Remodified venue <> 4 areas of music - including an outdoor

Saturday, December 31, 2005 * All Together presented by Plays Kool *

Join us for ALL TOGETHER as we celebrate the memories of 2005 and party the
night away. Welcome in the new year with a fun filled night of music,
dancing, friends, art, and entertainment. Special prizes for dancers in
costume! Dress up and shine like a star! Bring a date for a special new
years countdown and midnight kiss! Trance Sand Box: Dyloot (Adjusted, Noys,
Deep Voices, Skills), Mystre (Reverb), Majere (Elektrosorcery), Taj (1015),
Brett James vs. Sal DJ vs. Plate Tektonics (Cal Trance), Kid Wicked (Tunnel
Visionz), and Owl (Seekr). Jungle and Breaks Gym: Channel Surfer (F-8,
Firetribe), The Doctor (Bayraves), DOS, Aaron Jae (Evil Breaks), Nick Nyquil
(Oneiromancy), Reclipse (Drum Syndicate), and BAM (Evil Breaks). Happy Play
Ground: D-Unit vs. Riff Raff (Zapatistas/Hard Heads), Secondbase, Happy
Freaks (Hi-C, vs. Kid Orange, vs. Crackerjack), Sideshow (HCFTP), Rye Bread
(HCFTP), DJ Spell (Hard Heads), and Precision (Hard Heads). $20 at the door,
9pm-5am, All ages, San Francisco. Info line: 415.267.6921

Saturday, December 31, 2005 * Sea of Dreams presented by Madison House & 
Anon Salon *

Superlive! The String Cheese Incident, Dresden Dolls, Yard Dogs Road Show, 
Ganga Giri (Tribal Dreamtime), Luna Groove; Electrosonica! Lorin 
(Bassnectar), Lawgiverz (Trigger Uk), Jen (Wicked), Laird (Get Yr. Freak 
On!), Random Rab (El Circo), Brother (13 Moontribe), Soteg (Bless 
Records), and many more. Mystic Marvels! Vau De Vire Society (Aerial & 
Contortion Circus), El Circo, The Indigo Belly Dance, Mystic Family 
Circus, Futuretrybe. Located @ SF Concourse Exhibition Center, 635 8th 
Street (@ Brannan), San Francisco, .CA 94103. 18+ $70 door. Costumes VERY 
Encouraged.  Come Dressed as your Dream!


Sunday, January 01, 2006 - * Thump Radio presents Breakfast in Bed *

When: Sunday Jan 01, 2006 at 6:00 AM. Where: Supper Club 657 Harrison St. 
San Francisco, CA 94101 US View Map Breakfast in Bed - 6 AM New Years Day 
@ Supper Club

SPREAD THE WORD... Start your new year off right with Breakfast in Bed. 
Long after all the amateurs have gone back to the burbs, the professionals 
party on. Whether you've been up all night or avoided NYE all together, 
this serves as your wake up call for 2006. The stage is set for one very 
entertaining event complete with complimentary breakfast goody creations 
from Chef Niccolo Leone. Have someone in the group that is falling 
out????, lure them to Breakfast in Bed with the promise of Bed Time 
stories and Champagne. The event begins at 6am sharp with no breaks in the 
talent, so the party wont stop. D:Fuse is coming to SF for this event only 
and our special surprise dj guest easily appears on top billing around the 
world. The lounge is filled with the finest downtempo djs from the new 
Below Zero Show on Energy 92.7FM including Sinukus and Masonic. Lineup 
includes: D:fuse Danny Buddha Morales Didje Kelli Andrew Phelan Sen-Sei 
Michael Anthony Dutch Masonic Sinukus Sattva and.... a special 
international DJ that we cannot announce until the party starts! Get you 
Bed Reserved - or - $10 tickets @ www.thumpradio.com

Saturday, January 28, 2006 *  Connected SF presented presented by Love & 
Honor Prod with Avellino Ent

Last year, nearly a thousand people from the two major west coast scenes 
unite in LA for our first installment of the Connected series. This year 
we journey to the San Francisco bayarea. Come join us as embrace and 
celebrate the underground vibe that spans two cities, and experience once 
again what it feels like to be CONNECTED. Area One: Hardcore: 
Cloudskipper, The Nice Guys, Go-Zania vs. Leon Cook, Secondbase, Hi-C vs. 
Kiddo, Joshuah, Kid Orange vs. Sideshow, Precision, and Rye Bread. Area 
Two: Drum and Bass: Infiltrata w/MC DRE, SDF-1, The Doctor, Arize, Nick 
Nyquil vs. Andy P, Reclipse, and Octane vs. Tony C. Area Three: House: 
Thee-o, J. Splat, Felipe Avelar, DJ Doza, Carlos Alfonzo, Riff Raff, 
Viynal Junkies, Soul 1, and Rob Base. All ages welcome. There will be a 
cande making booth and free give aways from our PLUR Patrol all night 
long. All ages welcome. 8pm till 5am. $20 at the door. Infolines 
415.267.1808 / 310.512.6063

2005-12-31 : SFRaves Calendar Stats:

-------------------------------------------------
Administrative Notes
-------------------------------------------------

THE SFRaves.org Calendar is sent via email every week.
To subscribe to the list, send a message to:
sfraves-calendar-subscribe@hyperreal.org

To remove your address from the list, send a message to:
sfraves-calendar-unsubscribe@hyperreal.org

Send mail to the following for info and FAQ for this list:
sfraves-calendar-info@hyperreal.org or sfraves-calendar-faq@hyperreal.org

If you have events to add to the SFRaves calendar, please publish them by
Friday @ Noon to be included in the SFR Calendar Weekly Edition Mailing.

SFRaves is a not for profit entity serving the Bay Area & all forms of
electronic music for 13 years.
